== Abstract == 
Abdul Qadir Bajamal (Arabic: عبد القادر باجمال‎; born February 18, 1946) was the Prime Minister of Yemen from 31 March 2001 to 7 April 2007. He is a member of the General People's Congress party and was appointed as Prime Minister by President Ali Abdullah Saleh. Previously he served as Foreign Minister from 1998 to 2001.


== Honours ==


=== Foreign honours ===
 Italy
 Two Sicilian Royal Family: Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Order of Francis I
